description:
Looking for a Technical Project Manager to manage a team of Project Managers.

World-class consumer products company in California looking for someone to lead a team of Project Managers. Our client is about $250M in sales and they are looking to double in size in the coming years.

Here are the client requirements:

Must have experience working with a technical product
Must have solid leadership of people.
Must have a solid track record of Project Management.
Must have a technical degree.
